snippet: Maryland running back Wes Brown has been arrested on charges that he assaulted a police officer and secretly recorded their conversation.
abstract: University of Maryland running back Wes Brown is arrested and charged with assaulting police officer and secretly recording their conversation.
lead_paragraph: Maryland running back Wes Brown has been arrested on charges that he assaulted a police officer and secretly recorded their conversation.

headline.main: Maryland Running Back Is Charged With Assault
